summary: Feature request to reclassify benign application errors in OpenTelemetry traces for the PHP SDK, referencing a related Python SDK issue for implementation guidance.
userImpact: Users will have more accurate OpenTelemetry traces that properly distinguish between benign application errors and actual SDK/system failures.
proposedFix: Implement error reclassification logic similar to the approach used in the Python SDK (issue #1041) for the PHP SDK.
